summary: Literally this is so dumb. Listen if you don’t understand pansexuality or it’s apparently not a thing in your country, then you...
body: Literally this is so dumb. Listen if you don’t understand pansexuality or it’s apparently not a thing in your country, then you don’t get to decide whether pansexuality generally exists. You respect that it does everywhere else and you move on. If you don’t have anything nice or relevant or helpful to say, don’t spread your ignorance. Pansexuality is valid, it exists. It exists in the Skam universes. Anyone who disagrees—edcuate yourself.

It exists in the Skam universes. Anyone who disagrees—edcuate yourself.

Listen if you don’t understand pansexuality or it’s apparently not a thing in your country, then you don’t get to decide whether pansexuality generally exists. You respect that it does everywhere else and you move on. If you don’t have anything nice or relevant or helpful to say, don’t spread your ignorance. Pansexuality is valid, it exists. It exists in the Skam universes. Anyone who disagrees—edcuate yourself.

tags: i maybe even teared up a little
summary: I was rewatching the moment Lucas comes out to his mom in episode 9 and I forgot how beautiful that scene was. The music picking...
body:
I was rewatching the moment Lucas comes out to his mom in episode 9 and I forgot how beautiful that scene was. The music picking up speed, Lucas waiting nervously for her reply then his face when his mom told him she loved him and was proud of him. 

Honestly, I had CHILLS watching it.

reblog.comment:
I was rewatching the moment Lucas comes out to his mom in episode 9 and I forgot how beautiful that scene was. The music picking up speed, Lucas waiting nervously for her reply then his face when his mom told him she loved him and was proud of him.

blog.name: jebentnietalleen
blog.title: For the ones that feel it the most
blog.description: Hi, I'm Tara. I live in the Netherlands. 30 years old. Decided to delurk now that my skam obsession had returned with a vengeance.

tags: i hope you are still awake <3
summary: tara my love my corner of the fandom is exhausting right now please give me a fluffly elu headcanon so I can go to bed with a...
question: tara my love my corner of the fandom is exhausting right now please give me a fluffly elu headcanon so I can go to bed with a smile on my face or otherwise I might start randomly screaming
answer:
anything for you my dear 💕✨

~

the breeze hits him in the face a bit, but lucas doesn’t mind. it’s been an unusually warm day and he likes it, to cool down while they drive home. every once in a while his eyes drift close, can’t help it after lying in the sun all day. when he feels eliott’s hand on his leg, he wakes up, turns towards him in his seat. ‘this was a good day, wasn’t it?’ eliott says, not quite a question, but still: ‘are you kidding me? there was the sun, there was a picknick at the lake, and there was you. what more could i possibly want’ eliott grins at that, gives him a quick glance before looking back at the road again. his hand moves to his knee and squeezes it. ‘don’t forget the kisses’ lucas scoffs: ‘well, naturally, when i am with you there are always kisses. i didn’t think i needed to clarify that’ eliott is quiet for a bit, and lucas turns to look out the window. he can see a few stars out, and it smells like springtime. like summer is about to happen any minute now. ‘days like this is how i want to spent our entire summer’ he muses out loud. eliott smiles, his eyes crinkle: ‘sounds like a plan. although we might want to also see our friends and family every once in a while.’ lucas makes a noncommital sound at that: ‘sure, as long as they don’t mind the kissing. that’s non-negotiable.’ eliott’s hand is back at his leg again: ‘i’m sure they are used to that by now.’ lucas entwines their fingers together, brings their hands up to his mouth to give a kiss right then and there. ‘well good, then i think we can hang out with them from time to time. as long as we have a lot of nights just like this.’ eliott swipes his thumb over his knuckles, says: ‘as many as you want. infinite nights like this. other lucas’ and eliott’s will be jealous of us.’ lucas can’t help himself: ‘they already are’ eliott chuckles: ‘you know what, you are right. lucas nr. 1 and eliott nr. 1 are over the moon in love’ the rest of the drive home is quiet and content, and lucas drifts back into sleep, dreams of night full of laughter and love.

reblog.comment:
anything for you my dear 💕✨

~

body:
Final episode skam france!?!

Somehow this time around it is even worse facing the final episode. During the season 4 of OG Skam we knew from the beginning it would be the last season. So we got in it prepared. Now we don’t know what’s gonna happen and this not knowing is giving me sincere anxiety.

reblog.comment:

summary: I agree with anon about so used to not seeing elu + boysquad.. and they failed to revive the girls for me so yah.. and sofiane.....
question: I agree with anon about so used to not seeing elu + boysquad.. and they failed to revive the girls for me so yah.. and sofiane.. oh man i hate that they got me with that, im so easy to please lmao.. so idk, it feels like it's already over BUT watch me devastated when we finally see them in the clip for the / last time /
answer: I’m gonna be a right mess tbh. Y'all will be in for a treat.
